meanings.definition: Remove (a hat or other item of clothing) as a gesture of respect or greeting.
meanings.sent1: He would doff his hat when he saw a friend.
meanings.sent2: It is polite to doff your cap when entering a church.
meanings.sent3: The gentleman doffed his hat to the passing squirrel.
meanings.sent4: She doffed her coat, revealing a colorful dress underneath.
meanings.sent5: The knight doffed his helmet before the king, showing his loyalty.

meanings.sent1: Please doff your shoes before entering the house.
meanings.sent2: It is comfortable to doff your sweater on a warm day.
meanings.sent3: He tried to doff his jacket but got stuck in the sleeve.
meanings.sent4: She quickly doffed her gloves before starting to work.
meanings.sent5: The athlete doffed his jersey after the game, feeling relieved.

meanings.definition: To tip or remove one's hat as a greeting or sign of respect.
meanings.sent1: The old man would doff his hat to every passerby.
meanings.sent2: In the past, it was common to doff your hat to a lady.
meanings.sent3: The magician doffed his hat and pulled out a rabbit.
meanings.sent4: She would doff her hat with a smile, showing her kindness.
meanings.sent5: The cowboy doffed his hat to the sunset, ending a long day.
